short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Run CyberChef in a dedicated popup window

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Currently, using CyberChef requires users to navigate away from their current work tab to access its features on a separate webpage. This can disrupt workflow, particularly when tasks require frequent use of CyberChef. I use it daily.

My extension aims to address this issue by enabling CyberChef to be opened in a dedicated popup window or modal when the extension icon is clicked. This would allow users (like myself) to utilize CyberChef's functionalities without leaving their current work environment, thereby enhancing efficiency and the user experience.

In the next release, I will be working on adding the save and load functionality.
